netsquid\.nodes
===============

*Nodes* are composite components that represent the location entities (:py:obj:`~pydynaa.core.Entity`) of a quantum network. At these locations classical and quantum operations are considered local.
*Connections* are composite components that link remote nodes.

.. toctree::
    :caption: Modules
    :maxdepth: 2

    api_nodes/netsquid.nodes.node
    api_nodes/netsquid.nodes.connections
    api_nodes/netsquid.nodes.network
